items.sentence: On the one hand he is kind to everyone, but on the other hand he never behaves with too much familiarity.
Tom started the car and waited a few minutes for the car to warm up before he pulled out of the driveway.
Mary had a rule not to kiss on the first three dates, but this rule went out the window when she met Tom.
Tom and Mary's new apartment has three bedrooms. Does that mean that they're planning on having children?
The worst-case scenario is that Tom will lose his job and won't be able to keep up his mortgage payments.
